Description: A glazed composition tile from an inlay: in the form of the top of a palm tree, with incised lines to indicate the details of the stem and branches. Green glaze partially faded to white. The back is pierced by two holes at the edges, to allow for secure attachment.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Temple of Osiris-Khentimentu (Abydos), Chamber M69 deposit
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' II (London, 1902), 25 and pls. I, VII, 87.
